descriptionNullable:
This dataset serves as the foundation for an Afaan Oromoo News Classification System, designed to categorize news articles based on their content. The dataset was curated from the archives of FANA Broadcasting Corporation Afaan Oromoo, a prominent news agency providing comprehensive coverage in Afaan Oromoo.

Sources:
The primary source for this dataset is FANA Broadcasting Corporation, a trusted news outlet known for its diverse coverage across various categories. The dataset includes news articles spanning multiple genres, allowing for a comprehensive understanding of Afaan Oromoo in a news context.

Inspiration:
The inspiration behind creating this dataset lies in the pursuit of advancing natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning (ML) applications for Afaan Oromoo. By providing a diverse and well-curated collection of news articles, this dataset aims to contribute to the development of intelligent systems capable of understanding and categorizing Afaan Oromoo texts accurately.
title: Afaan Oromoo Categorized News Articles
subtitle: Afan Oromo news articles
